alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Johnson; Laurens; Treutlen (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 11:52AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Laurens, west central Emanuel, central Treutlen and southeastern Johnson Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1152 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Dudley, or 7 miles west of Dublin, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Soperton, East Dublin, Adrian, Dexter, Dudley, Orland, Rockledge, Orianna, Minter, Lovett, Harlow, Meeks, Brewton, Blackville, Zaidee and Scott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for central and east central Georgia.
